meta.job_title: Specialist In The Public Cloud Business Technology Platform

duties_responsibilities.duty: Utilize SAP Business Technology Platform to realize customer's vison and solve their most complex problems.
Lead the solution component of the Business Technology Platform sales cycles.
Conduct discovery sessions to build relationships with prospective customers and understand their unique needs.
Drive prescriptive outcomes with customers in partnership with the account team.
Effectively present to customers remotely using virtual and digital technologies.
Develop key digital assets as the portfolio evolves.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor equivalent: minimum requirement, Master equivalent: optional
